subject: Splitting class from source
msgSnippet: I keep my source files in a src directory.  When I build with Ant, I compile my class files into a build directory.  I would like to then run JUnit tests
messageBody:
I keep my source files in a "src" directory. When I build with Ant,
I compile my class files into a "build" directory. I would like to
then run JUnit tests against the newly created classes in the build
directory, but JUnit can't seem to do this unless the .java files are
copied there as well. I've tried setting a classpath to both
locations, but this does not solve the problem. Someone have a good
solution to this problem?
